data.title: Realo Drugs
data.meta_description: Locally owned and operated since 1982, Realo Drugs' community-minded pharmacies provide North Carolina with dedicated customer care and patient-focused services from behind, and beyond, the counter.
data.text:
Find a Location Near You

Serving you in Eastern North Carolina since 1982, we are a locally owned community pharmacy dedicated to exceptional customer care with a friendly staff that will treat you like family.

Convenience at its best

From short wait times to drive thru's at every location to our Simply Med Sync program, we strive to make medication pickup stress-free. Use our Realo app to refill your prescriptions, set up medication reminders, and even view our hours and phone numbers. Our new patient portal shows your medications at a glance and your healthcare team for quick reference. We find every opportunity to simplify when it comes to your medications because we know how busy life can be.

More than just prescriptions

Our top priority is your health and the health of the communities we serve. Our motto is "let our family take care of your family" because we truly believe in each other as family and want you to be a part of our family, too. We take pride in caring for our patients with a listening and attentive ear.
